meanings.sent1: The postelection analysis showed the impact of the election results.
meanings.sent2: The candidates discussed their postelection plans for the country.
meanings.sent3: After the postelection party, everyone shared their thoughts on the election.
meanings.sent4: The postelection period was filled with discussions about the future.
meanings.sent5: The postelection atmosphere was filled with anticipation and uncertainty.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period following an election.
meanings.sent1: The postelection period was a time of transition for the government.
meanings.sent2: Citizens eagerly awaited the postelection results.
meanings.sent3: The postelection events brought the community together.
meanings.sent4: The postelection discussions focused on policy changes.
meanings.sent5: The postelection process involved reviewing the voting procedures.
